TypeSignature.Value: public class UpdateProgress : System.Web.UI.Control, System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
.class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateProgress extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.IAttributeAccessor, class System.Web.UI.IScriptControl
Public Class UpdateProgress Inherits Control Implements IAttributeAccessor, IScriptControl
public ref class UpdateProgress : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::IAttributeAccessor, System::Web::UI::IScriptControl
type UpdateProgress = class inherit Control interface IAttributeAccessor interface IScriptControl

summary.span: 更新一个或多个 控件的内容时，在浏览器中提供可视反馈。

span.span: Provides visual feedback in the browser when the contents of one or more controls are updated.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 本主题内容：In this topic: - [介绍Introduction](#introduction) - [将 UpdateProgress 与 UpdatePanel 控件关联Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control](#associating_an_updateprogress_with_an_updatepanel_control) - [指定 UpdateProgress 控件的内容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control](#specifying_the_content_of_the_updateprogress_control) - [将 UpdateProgress 控件置于页面上Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page](#putting_updateprogress_controls_on_the_page) - [自定义 UpdateProgress 控件的显示时间Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed](#customizing_when_updateprogress_controls_are_displayed) - [应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [声明性语法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 介绍Introduction 控件使你可以提供有关部分页面呈现进度的反馈。The control enables you to provide feedback about the progress of partial-page rendering. 对于回发或初始页面呈现 , 不显示控件内容。For postbacks or initial page rendering, control content is not displayed. 页面可以包含多个控件。The page can contain multiple controls. 每个控件都可以与不同的控件相关联。Each one can be associated with a different control. 或者, 您可以使用一个控件, 并将其与页面上的所有控件相关联。Alternatively, you can use one control and associate it with all the controls on the page. 控件将呈现一个`div`显示或隐藏的元素, 具体取决于回发源自的位置以及 是否已设置该控件的属性。 The control renders a `div` element that is displayed or hidden depending on where a postback originates and whether the property of the control is set. ## 将 UpdateProgress 与 UpdatePanel 控件关联Associating an UpdateProgress with an UpdatePanel Control 通过设置控件的属性, 可以将控件与控件相关联。 You associate controls with an control by setting the property of the control. 当回发事件源自控件内部时, 将显示任何关联的控件。When a postback event originates from inside an control, any associated controls are displayed. 如果未设置属性, 控件将显示来自任何控件内部的任何异步回发的进度。If you do not set the property, the control displays progress for any asynchronous postback that originates from inside any control. 它也会显示为面板触发器的任何控件。It is also displayed for any controls that are triggers for panels. 属性对控件行为具有以下影响:The property has the following effect on control behavior: - 如果未设置该属性 , 则将显示以下回发的控件:When the property is not set, the control is displayed for the following postbacks: - 源自任何控件内部的回发。Postbacks that originate from inside any control. - 源自作为任何控件的异步触发器的控件的回发。Postbacks that originate from controls that are asynchronous triggers for any control. - 当属性设置为控件 ID 时, 将为源自关联控件内的回发显示控件。 When the property is set to an control ID, the control is displayed for postbacks that originate from inside the associated control. 如果将属性设置为不存在的控件, 则永远不会显示该控件。 If the property is set to a control that does not exist, the control will never be shown. 如果将 控件的属性设置为`false` , 而回发源自控件内部, 则仍将显示任何关联控件。If the property of the controls is set to `false` and a postback originates from inside an control, any associated controls will still be displayed. ## 指定 UpdateProgress 控件的内容Specifying the Content of the UpdateProgress Control 使用属性指定控件显示的消息。 Use the property to specify the message that is displayed by an control. 如果该属性为空, 则显示控件时不显示任何内容。If the property is empty, nothing is shown when the control is displayed. 模板可以包含 HTML 和标记。The template can contain HTML and markup. 例如, 可以显示一个动画图像, 用于通知用户回发正在处理。For example, you can display an animated image that notifies the user that the postback is processing. 还可以显示一个按钮, 用户可以单击该按钮来停止部分页面更新。You can also display a button that the user can click to stop the partial-page update. 此外, 您可能还希望在一个回发过程中阻止其他所有回发。Additionally, you might want to prevent all other postbacks while one is in progress. 下面的示例演示可用于完成这些任务的客户端脚本。The following example shows client script that you can use to accomplish these tasks. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress4/VB/default.aspx#1)] 可以通过将`onClick` `HtmlButton`控件的属性设置为 "AbortPostBack ()" 来使用示例代码。You can use the example code by setting the `onClick` attribute of an `HtmlButton` control to "AbortPostBack()". 有关详细信息, 请参阅类的方法和属性。For more information, see the method and the property of the class. ## 将 UpdateProgress 控件置于页面上Putting UpdateProgress Controls on the Page 控件可以在其他控件的内部或外部。 controls can be inside or outside other controls. 控件的模板的显示不依赖于控件所在的位置。The display of the control's template does not depend on where the control is located. 在嵌套控件中, 子面板位于父面板中。In a nested control, a child panel is inside a parent panel. 在这种情况下, 从子面板内部产生的回发将导致显示与子面板和父面板关联的所有控件。In that case, a postback that originates from inside the child panel causes all controls associated with the child panel and the parent panel to be displayed. 如果回发源自父面板的直接子控件, 则只显示与父面板关联的控件。If a postback originates from an immediate child control of the parent panel, only the controls that are associated with the parent panel are displayed. ## 自定义 UpdateProgress 控件的显示时间Customizing When UpdateProgress Controls Are Displayed 默认情况下, 控件在显示其内容之前等待0.5 秒 (500 毫秒)。By default, the control waits .5 seconds (500 milliseconds) before it displays its contents. 如果异步回发速度非常快, 这有助于防止控件闪烁。This helps prevent the control from flashing if an asynchronous postback is very quick. 可以通过设置属性来指定延迟时间。You can specify the delay by setting the property. 如果需要更好地控制控件的显示时间, 可以为类的和事件提供客户端脚本。If you need finer control over when an control is displayed, you can provide client script for the and events of the class. 在事件处理程序中, 可以显示表示控件的 DOM 元素。 `beginRequest`In the `beginRequest` event handler, you can display the DOM element that represents the control. `endRequest`在事件处理程序中, 可以隐藏它。In the `endRequest` event handler, you can hide it. 在以下情况下, 必须提供客户端脚本, 以便在目标控件更新时显示控件:You must provide client script to display an control when a target control is updated in the following circumstances: - 当控件的回发被注册为面板的异步回发触发器时, 该页上有一个控件。When a postback from a control is registered as an asynchronous postback trigger for the panel, and there is an control on the page. 但是, 该属性未设置为面板的 ID。However, the property is not set to the panel's ID. - 通过使用 控件的方法将来自控件的回发注册为异步回发控件。When postbacks from controls are registered as asynchronous postback controls by using the method of the control. ## 应用 CSS 样式Applying CSS Styles 控件接受 expando 特性。The control accepts expando attributes. 这样就可以在控件呈现的 HTML 元素上设置一个 CSS 类。This makes it possible to set a CSS class on the HTML elements that the controls render. 例如, 你可能会创建以下示例中所示的标记:For example, you might create the markup shown in the following example: ``` ``` 当页面运行时, 上一示例中的标记将呈现类似于以下内容的 HTML:The markup in the previous example renders HTML similar to the following when the page runs: ```
``` ## 声明性语法Declarative Syntax ```                                ``` ## Examples 下面的示例演示了使用控件在异步回发过程中显示进度的不同方法。The following examples show different ways to use the control to show progress during asynchronous postbacks. 下面的示例显示一个控件, 该控件显示两个控件的进度状态。The following example shows one control that displays progress status for two controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress1/VB/default.aspx#1)] 下面的示例演示两个控件。This following example shows two controls. 每个控件都显示关联控件的进度状态。Each control displays progress status for an associated control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/CS/default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Atlas/System.Web.UI.UpdateProgress2/VB/default.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态创建控件时, 可以创建从控件继承的自定义模板。When you create an control dynamically, you create a custom template that inherits from the control. 在方法中指定标记, 然后将动态创建的控件的属性设置为自定义模板的新实例。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 动态创建控件时, 必须在页的事件期间或之前执行此操作。When you create controls dynamically, you must do so during or before the event of the page. 如果稍后在页面生命周期中创建控件, 则不会显示进度。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件显示其状态的 控件的 ID。

span.span: Gets or sets the ID of the control that the control displays status for.

value.span: 关联的 控件的 ID。

span.span: The ID of the associated control.

value.span: 默认值为一个空字符串。

span.span: The default value is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认值为空字符串, 表示控件不与特定控件关联。The default value is an empty string, which means that the control is not associated with a specific control. 因此, 从属于面板触发器的控件内的任何控件或回发发出的异步回发都会导致控件显示其内容。Therefore, asynchronous postbacks that originate from inside any control or postbacks from controls that are triggers for the panel cause the control to display its content. 可以将属性设置为相同命名容器、父命名容器或页面中的控件。You can set the property to controls in the same naming container, in a parent naming container, or in the page.

summary.span: 获取或设置显示 控件之前所经过的时间值（以毫秒为单位）。

span.span: Gets or sets the value in milliseconds before the control is displayed.

value.span: 一个整数，表示在显示 控件的进度模板之前所经过的毫秒数。

span.span: An integer that represents the number of milliseconds before the control's progress template is displayed.

value.span: 默认值为 500 毫秒（.5 秒）。

span.span: The default is 500 milliseconds (.5 seconds).
The property is less than zero.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值可确定是否动态呈现进度模板。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines whether the progress template is rendered dynamically.

value.span: 如果动态呈现进度模板，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the progress template is rendered dynamically; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性确定是否仅在需要时才在页面上分配进度模板内容的空间。The property determines whether space for the progress template's contents is allocated on the page only when it is needed. 当属性为`true`时, 在第一次呈现页面时, 不会分配进度模板内容的空间。 When the property is `true`, space for the progress template's contents is not allocated when the page is first rendered. 相反, 页面会动态更改以在需要时显示内容。Instead, the page changes dynamically to display the contents when it is required. 在呈现的标记中`div`包含进度模板的元素的`display` `none`属性中, 特性设置为。 `style`In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `none`. 当属性为`false`时, 将在第一次呈现页面时分配进度模板内容的空间, 并且控件内容是页面布局的物理组成部分。 When the property is `false`, space for the progress template's contents is allocated when the page is first rendered, and the control content is physically part of the page layout. `block` `display` `hidden` `visibility`在呈现的标记中`div`包含进度模板的元素的属性中,特性设置为,并且该特性最初设置为。`style`In the `style` property of the `div` element that contains the progress template in the rendered markup, the `display` attribute is set to `block`, and the `visibility` attribute is initially set to `hidden`.

summary.span: 获取或设置用于定义 控件内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template that defines the content of the control.

value.span: 一个 实例，用于定义 控件的内容。

span.span: An instance that defines the content of the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 必须定义模板。The template must be defined. 否则, 在控件的`Init`事件发生时, 将引发异常。Otherwise, an exception is thrown during the control's `Init` event. 可以通过向`ProgressTemplate`元素添加标记来以声明方式指定属性。You can specify the property declaratively by adding markup to the `ProgressTemplate` element. 如果`ProgressTemplate`元素中没有标记, 则不会为控件显示任何内容。If there is no markup in the `ProgressTemplate` element, nothing is displayed for the control. 如果要动态创建控件, 可以创建从控件继承的自定义模板。If you are creating controls dynamically, you can create a custom template that inherits from the control. 在方法中指定标记, 然后将动态创建的控件的属性设置为自定义模板的新实例。You specify markup in the method, and then set the property of the dynamically created control to a new instance of the custom template. 如果动态创建控件, 请在页的事件期间或之前执行此操作。If you create controls dynamically, do so during or before the event of the page. 如果稍后在页面生命周期中创建控件, 则不会显示进度。If you create the control later in the page life cycle, progress is not displayed.

related.span: ASP.NET Web 服务器控件模板

span.span: ASP.NET Web Server Controls Templates

summary.span: 通过使用提供的 对象，将 控件的呈现内容写入浏览器。

span.span: Writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件开发人员使用 方法来扩展控件的功能。The method is used by control developers to extend the functionality of the control. 方法使用 提供的对象将控件的呈现内容写入浏览器。 The method writes the rendered content of the control to the browser by using the supplied object. 在派生类中重写方法时, 调用基类的方法, 以便呈现控件的子控件。When you override the method in a derived class, call the base class's method so that the child controls of the control are rendered.
